article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says almost 34,800 killed in Gaza since start of war.
sentence: Hamas-run  health  ministry  says  almost  34,800  killed  in  Gaza  since  start  of  war.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says almost 34,800 killed in Gaza since start of war.
sentence: The  Hamas-run  health  ministry  in  Gaza  says  34,789  Palestinians  have  been  killed  in  the  territory  since  7  October,  after  Israel  launched  its  military  campaign  in  response  to  Hamas's  attacks  on  southern  Israel.

article_title: Hamas-run health ministry says almost 34,800 killed in Gaza since start of war.
sentence: Hamas  gunmen  stormed  into  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  seizing  more  than  250  hostages.
